The class library was external source (not a java element). In this case, we 
cannot show a type hierarchy (can only show for java elements).

CC'ing EG for RC3 approval.

Fixed. Assigning to Luc & Jared for double verification.

An instanceof check is added to 3 actions:
(1) variables view - open declared type hierarchy
(2) variables view - open concrete type hierarchy
(3) debug view - open declared type hierarchy

When the source element is not a java element, an error message is displayed in 
the status line and there is a beep. Added "status line clearing" to the debug 
and variable views, when the selection changes.
